items.title: Pig Latin's Secret Language Origins
items.description: Did you know Pig Latin was originally used as a secret language? Children in 19th-century America created it to communicate without adults understanding. Now VibeTrans makes this playful language accessible to everyone!

items.title: Rules That Make It Work
items.description: Pig Latin follows simple rules: words starting with consonants move the consonant to the end and add 'ay'; words starting with vowels just add 'way' or 'yay'. VibeTrans handles all these rules automatically for perfect translations!
